title: What kind of 2020 nostalgia things will we be seeing in a couple of decades? - Quora

response.answer_text: Commerative masks. Trumpybears People saying “I was in Portland! “ I got gassed by Trump's stormtroopers!” I helped knock down statues of patrimony and White Supremacy!” ‘”Were you at CHAZ?” Watching reruns of MSNBC. CNN and the rest announce that President Trump is reelected then they go into fits of apoplexy and spasms of wailing and gnashing of teeth. Watching them explain how he won again.
Not a goddamn thing. Not one. Wait… the moment trump was defeated. That’ll be worth celebrating 10, 20, 50 years from now.
